#summary The Shortcut Binder greasemonkey userscript.
#labels Featured

= Introduction =

Tool to bind certain shortcuts to clickable elements. You select an element (button, link etc), a key combination and url patterns to include/exclude . When you press that key combination this userscript will simulate a click on that element.

*Note:* You need Greasemonkey: https://addons.mozilla.org/en-US/firefox/addon/748

*Download:* http://webmonkey-userscripts.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/shortcut_binder/shortcutbinder.user.js
